title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4025.6 - Procedure for making entries
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4025.6 - Procedure for making entries

State Regulations

Entries and declarations shall be made in writing
signed by the owner of the horse or of the engagement or by the authorized
agent or some person deputed by him or her; and in order to secure privacy, all
entries to overnight races must be made at a specially designated
booth. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4025.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
